sources.title: The Thursday Night Club | Full Movie | Heart Felt Christmas Drama | Hallmark
sources.description:
The Thursday Night Club is an inspirational film about what can happen when people spread kindness. When a young woman suffers a devastating loss, her four closest friends, led by an inspiring man, who challenges them to follow signs from heaven, witness the miraculous outcome when people make a real effort to help others.
2022.  Stars: Gloria Gaynor, Drew Moore, Fidel Vicioso

metadata.Plot: The Thursday Night Club is a feature film that will brighten and illuminate your Christmas celebration. When a young woman filled with the Christmas spirit suffers a devastating loss, her four closest friends work to bring the spirit back to her by helping others. Is it possible to live the Christmas spirit all year long? Watch The Thursday Night Club and find out.
metadata.Actors: Jessy Holtermann, Gloria Gaynor, Johan Gran
